Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€[ANN] [ICO] The ACLYD Project â€“ From The Field To Your Glass ğŸ”¥ğŸš€
Body: Aclyd designed to bring Alcoholic Beverages that come to your doorsteps by using the blockchain technology. Aclyd is a decentralized platform which speed up payment, clear and payment that helps to process all market participants like farmers, producers, importers, wholesalers, merchants, and end consumers.  The Us Tequila's sales industry is estimated at $2.6 Billion, now at present, it faces a supply crisis those are agave due to denoting an agricultural product that is unstable where supply is available and price variability. Therefore, all the results of the oversupply of the plant, decrease prices and the cycle is going for almost 30 years. Aclyd contracts are used in delivering future products that make effects on this market.  However, all these crops are traded internationally, the medium of exchanges, such as a cryptocurrency and that has no borders and helps to make easy and streamline these trades, in a great and clear way. ACLYD wallet restricts alcohol that purchases to those depend on the age requirements. ACLYD tokens are used throughout the values chain from consumers to farmers that offer in reducing costs and removes late payment processing.

Author: Twinkledoe
Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€[ANN] [ICO] The ACLYD Project â€“ From The Field To Your Glass ğŸ”¥ğŸš€
Body: Is there a minimum purchase order of alcoholic beverages from your platform? How about the shipping fee? Are you going to use third party provider for the logistics? Usually, shipping fee is higher than what you are about to purchase.

Author: jfvmcryptoblock
Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€[ANN] [ICO] The ACLYD Project â€“ From The Field To Your Glass ğŸ”¥ğŸš€
Body: Great question, the initial focus of our platform and wallet is the $26 Billion Dollar Wholesale Alcoholic Beverages Market of which Aclyd is already part of, Our current MVP is in partnership with our sister company Fuego Fino, Inc, (Founded by Jessica Contreras as well) a fully licensed US Importer/Wholesaler with sales in the Arizona market, and we plan to expand the usage of our token throughout this industry, cutting payment times and costs. We are here to first resolve an existing -well known to us- problem, once we expand our scope to the retail industry, we will have partners that due to the volumes we handle, will be able to deliver at a very convenient rate.

Author: Twinkledoe
Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€[ANN] [ICO] The ACLYD Project â€“ From The Field To Your Glass ğŸ”¥ğŸš€
Body: Okay, so right now such details for my queries are not yet refined. Because shipping outside the US, a customer really needs to pay a hefty fee. So sometimes, that's the hurdle. Let's see what would this platform come up for their customers.

Author: jfvmcryptoblock
Title: ğŸ”¥ğŸš€[ANN] [ICO] The ACLYD Project â€“ From The Field To Your Glass ğŸ”¥ğŸš€
Body: This is true, and we can optimize the cost as much as possible through technology and partnerships; however, when it comes to international shipping, the biggest problem tends to be the tax each country charges, there is really no way around that. For wholesalers and importers our frictionless payment processing and smart contracting system raises accountability, reduces costs, cuts transaction times, and allows for greater distribution of wealth. For retail consumers our model will work more at a local and nationwide level rather than international.  Finally, thank you so much for your questions!
